name: qsmxt
label: QSMxT for Automated Quantitative Susceptibility Mapping
description: QSMxT is an end-to-end pipeline for Quantitative Susceptibility Mapping (QSM).
author: Ashley Stewart
cite: Stewart, SW, Robinson, SD, O'Brien, K, et al. QSMxT: Robust masking and artifact reduction for quantitative susceptibility mapping. Magn Reson Med. 2022; 87: 1289-1300. doi:10.1002/mrm.29048

premade.description: Premade pipeline; 'gre' uses sensible default for 3D-GRE acquisitions; 'epi' uses sensible defaults for 3D-EPI acquisitions (human brain only); 'bet' uses a standard BET-masking approach (human brain only); 'fast' uses a series of fast QSM algorithms; 'body' uses sensible defaults for body imaging applications; 'nextqsm' uses the suggested settings for the NeXtQSM model.

qsm_protocol_pattern.description: Pattern used to identify protocol names intended for QSM reconstruction. By default, ALL acquisitions are considered QSM. If your DICOMs contain non-QSM images, you MUST specify which protocol is intended for QSM using this pattern.

qsmxt_cmd_args.description: Specify additional command-line arguments for QSMxT
